function ERU_EP05_09()
    -- .起-5【1月第2週】「目覚め」
    SaveData.Title = "目覚め"

    -- //BG：病室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

    -- //BU：ダリア（驚き）、アキラ・私服（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0700.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Minato-kun? W-What happened? You're covered in mud."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1402.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I'm sorry. There was something I absolutely had to tell Marika-neesan."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Remembering how important Arumeria-san was, I visited Marika-neesan's hospital room.]])

    MSG([[ I took out the smartphone with the voice message recorded on it and started preparing to play it. I really wanted Neesan to hear it.]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What on earth happened? Earlier you said on the phone that Mariccho might wake up."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1403.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I'll explain in detail later. First, I want Akira and the others to hear this too."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1404.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Marika-neesan... I found Alto-oneechan's last words."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0701.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Minato-kun, th-this voice is――"]])

    MSG([[ As Arumeria-san's voice played in the hospital room, I spoke to Marika-neesan, who was still asleep in her bed.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1405.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The 'Neesan' I wanted to protect was actually two people. Marika-neesan knew that and stayed silent to protect me."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1406.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The reason I was so attached to Neesan... is probably because I directed all the love meant for two people toward Marika-neesan. I realize that now."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1407.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you for always protecting me... But from now on, it's my turn to help both of you."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1408.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I had thought Arumeria-oneechan was resented by Marika-neesan... but that's not true."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1409.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The Marika-neesan I know well is completely the opposite. Neesan must want to save Arumeria-oneechan."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1410.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "To save Arumeria-oneechan, I'll cooperate too. Now, Marika-neesan, it's time to open your eyes."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1411.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Let's go save Arumeria-oneechan together!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0702.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Eh...? Marika's body just twitched."]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Ah... au..."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Sh-she's trying to say something!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1412.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "M-Marika-neesan!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0703.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Marika! You woke up! Wait here! I’ll call the doctor right away!"]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan moved only her eyes to look at me, panting with a mouth that probably couldn't open well, trying to tell me something.]])

    MSG([[ It's okay. Even without words, I understand. Over this past year, I've come to understand Marika-neesan’s feelings.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //CG：マリカの覚醒
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV041aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mariccho～～～～!"]])

    MSG([[ Akira couldn’t hold back and hugged Neesan. Marika-neesan's eyes narrowed, and her face, still troubled, displayed a gentle smile.]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1413.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Welcome back, Marika-neesan."]])

    MSG([[ Like Akira, I gently embraced Marika-neesan’s body.]])

    MSG([[ It had really been a long time since the three of us were together like this.]])

    MSG([[ It felt nostalgic. Happy. Warm. A very comforting feeling spread deep within my chest.]])

    MSG([[ For now, let’s forget the complicated circumstances and problems. Because finally, Marika-neesan has awakened.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Some time passed since the day Marika-neesan woke up――]])

    -- //BU：モブ医者
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB14aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Doctor】
 "Oh, I'm surprised... It’s already astonishing that she woke up after nearly a year in a coma."]])

PLAY_VOICE("doctor_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Doctor】
 "And now, to think she’s standing and talking normally. Are you really human?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：マリカ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Hehe, yes, I’m human. I’m just a very weak human being."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Thank you for taking care of me. Now, Aki-chan, Mina-chan, shall we go home together?"]])

    -- //BU：マリカ（通常）、アキラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("mix_0034")
    MSG([[
    【Minato・Akira】
 "Yesss."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The original rehabilitation period was dramatically shortened, and Marika-neesan was soon allowed to leave the hospital.]])

    MSG([[ After the attending doctor left, we cleaned up the hospital room together while Marika-neesan told us many stories about what happened while she was asleep and before she collapsed.]])

    MSG([[ Though she was always in a dreamlike state while sleeping, she could clearly hear the words spoken to her.]])

    MSG([[ Seeing me troubled and burdened with many things, she saw her own reflection.]])

    MSG([[ That image seemed on the verge of breaking, very fragile, and she realized it was only natural that she collapsed.]])

    MSG([[ She also realized that she hadn’t really understood herself well, and even with Arumeria-san beside her, it was natural she didn’t notice things.]])

    MSG([[ After finishing her story, Neesan held our hands firmly and begged earnestly.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "What Aru-chan and Eru-chan are trying to pursue is a harsh path to live bearing all the ideals of people, something even I couldn’t handle."]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "If things continue like this, they won’t be saved. Please! To rescue Aru-chan and Eru-chan from the curse of the Himegami family, I beg you both for your help!"]])

    MSG([[ For the first time in her life, Marika-neesan asked us for help.]])

    MSG([[ Akira and I smiled at each other and, of course, accepted her wish.]])

    -- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ba")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Let’s show the Himegami family the power of the serious Ikusa family."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1415.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah... We’ll definitely stop Nemesia-san’s scheme!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Walls that can’t be overcome alone can be climbed when we all work together. Even if you forcibly keep playing the 'strong self,' eventually you’ll hit a limit.]])

    MSG([[ When you’re struggling, it’s okay to be honest, even if it seems embarrassing, and rely on someone. Surely, the people around you will accept it.]])

    MSG([[ Marika-neesan and I both hadn’t realized such an important thing for the longest time.]])

    MSG([[ We won’t repeat the same mistakes anymore. All of us will definitely save Arumeria-san.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
--STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_10")
end
